purpose: To enhance AI agent systems by providing a family of large action models for executing complex actions.
principle: Builds on large language models (LLMs) to enable AI agents to perform complex actions by integrating action models.
reusability: Offers modular components that can be integrated into existing AI agent frameworks, supports extensibility with custom actions.
limitations: Being in alpha stage, it may have limited coverage of actions and potential stability issues.
name: xLAM
description: xLAM: A Family of Large Action Models to Empower AI Agent Systems
highlight: Empowers AI agent systems with large action models for complex task execution.
